definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hide, conceal, esp. in earth (NH id.; whence perh. Aram. [[טְמֵן]] keep, preserve; cf. Ar. t.amara bury, hide (loan-word Frä:137); Aram. t.mar, [[טְמַר]] id.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[טְמֵן]] Ps 35:8 + 2 t. etc; Impf. [[וֵיִּטְמׂן]] Ge 35:4, etc.; Imv. sf. [[טָמְנֵהוּ]] Je 13:4; [[טָמְנֵם]] Job 40:13; Inf. cstr. [[לִטְמוֹן]] Job 31:33, Ps 64:6; Pt. pass. [[טָמוּן]] Job 3:16 + 3 t.; [[טְמוּנׇה]] Jos 7:22; pl. [[טְמֻנִיוּ]] Jos 7:21; cstr. [[טְמוּנֵי]] De 33:19; —

hide, c. acc. Ge 35:4 (E), Ex 2:12 (E; dead body in sand), Jos 2:6 (JE; spies under flax-stalks), Jos 7:21, Jos 7:22 (JE; Achan's theft), Je 13:4, Je 13:5, Je 13:6, Je 13:7 (Jer.'s girdle), Je 43:9, Je 43:10 (stones at Tahpanhes); hide, bury hand in dish ([[חַלָָּחַת]]) Pr 19:24, Pr 26:15 (of [[עָחֵל]] the sluggard); [[נֵפֶל]] [[טָמוּן]] Job 3:16 hidden abortion, i.e. a lifeless child at once buried; [[שְׂפֻנֵי טְמוּנֵי חול]] De 33:19 (poem); of hiding iniquity [[עון]] Job 31:33; hiding the wicked in the dust [[עפר]] Job 40:13.

often of hiding, concealing, secretly laying a snare [[רֶשֶׁת]] Ps 9:16, Ps 35:8, sq. [[לִי]] Ps 31:5; [[שַׁחַת רִשְׁתָּם]] Ps 35:7; [[פַּח]] sq. [[לִי]] Ps 140:6, Ps 142:4; sq. [[לרגלי]] Je 18:22; [[חבל]] Job 18:10; [[מוֹקשׁים]] Ps 64:5.

[[טָמוּן]] that which is darkened = darkness, Job 40:13 nearly = [[שְׁאוֹל]]: ´[[פניהם חֲבשׁ בט]] bind their faces in darkness (i.e. the wicked); hide = reserve Job 20:26 all darkness is held in reserve for his treasures, i.e. all calamities are stored up for them.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Imv. [[חִטָּמֵן בֶּעָפָר]] ´[[מִפְּנֵי פַּחַד י]] Is 2:10 hide thyself in the dust, from before the terror of ´[[י]].

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ? Ba:ZMG 1889, 180) Impf. [[וַיֵּלִכוּ וַיַּטְמִנוּ]] 2Ki 7:8, 2Ki 7:8 and they went and hid (it), i.e. plunder fr. Aram. camp.
